author: Blake Schuster
title: Chicago's United Center Turning into Logistics Hub During Coronavirus Pandemic
description: A little more than a month ago, the United Center in Chicago played host to the NBA All-Star game with some of the biggest names in sports strolling through the concourses...
content:
Nam Huh/Associated Press
A little more than a month ago, the United Center in Chicago played host to the NBA All-Star game with some of the biggest names in sports strolling through the concourses. On Wednesday, the city announced it was repurposing the buil… [+1605 chars]
